short_summary: Relating to the 01B46-22-126 contract and amendments
description: The project aims to provide maintenance services for the elevating devices at the Central Experimental Farm. The goal is to keep the elevating devices in good working order and extend their lifespan. This will benefit Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada by keeping the facility in good working order.
full_summary:
=====================

### Maintenance of Elevating Devices at the Central Experimental Farm

**Tender Reference:** PW-22-01011725

**Procedure:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Status:** Expiré / Expired

**Description:**
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) invites qualified service providers to submit proposals for the maintenance of elevating devices at the Central Experimental Farm (CEF) location.

**Schedule:**

*   **Tender Closing Date and Time:**
    *   December 9th, 2022, at 02:00 pm (EST)
*   **Optional Site Visit:**
    *   November 23rd, 2022, at 10:00 am (EST) at 960 Carling Avenue, Neatby Building, Ottawa, ON
*   **Pre-Site Visit Confirmation:**
    *   November 21st, 2022, via email to rachael.johnston@agr.gc.ca

**Key Requirements and Considerations:**

*   All tender documents must be obtained through the Buy and Sell service provider's platform.
*   Mandatory site visit attendance is highly recommended but not required.
*   Tender requests and inquiries must be directed to Carol Rahal, Contracts Officer, via email at carol.rahal@agr.gc.ca.

**Important Details:**

*   AAFC reserves the right to accept any proposal in whole or in part without prior negotiation and reject any or all proposals received.
*   A Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA) maybe be required prior to the awarding of the contract.

**Contact Information:**

*   Contracts Officer: Carol Rahal
    *   Email: carol.rahal@agr.gc.ca
    *   Phone: 418-928-1059
